entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:01 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 12:36 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: S 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 6:23 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:23 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
